about_the_game:
The Dark Tones: Loss — will tell you a tragic story, the source of inspiration of which is the cult series of Silent Hill games and an equally iconic work — Cry of Fear

Attention to detail and surroundings

All game levels were created from scratch in order to provide the player with a unique environment, rather than the same type of locations purchased on marketplaces and reused in other games.

All the contents of the game were arranged manually with great attention to detail and detail, in order to create a lively, filled and interesting game world.

The Dark Tones: Loss is an atmospheric story-oriented work

The short duration of the passage is compensated by the saturation and variety of events in the passage.

Here you will not find the same type of riddles, hours of searching for objects or aimless wandering around locations.

All the efforts, resources and time spent on the development of this work were aimed at creating an interesting, vivid and meaningful work in which the duration of the gameplay plays a secondary role.

History and the surrounding world filled with images and metaphors

Here you will not have to escape from zombies, run from ridiculous ghosts and crazed maniacs.

Living the life of the main character, you will encounter something much more terrible and frightening.

But, everything that is happening has a much deeper meaning than it might seem at first glance.

You have to get to the truth and put the puzzle together.

An adult story about choice, despair and the human soul

The plot of the game was not invented at random, it contains both personal experience and the experience of other people's stories.

The game does not aim to scare you with harsh sounds, monsters or ghosts, even if it also has that, but it encourages you to think about something more important and valuable that can really scare, but not reflexively, but mentally and emotionally, because it's not strange or scary things that really scare, things scare ordinary, real and real, which surround us every day, but which at the same time begin to look strange and therefore become scary.

Modern game engine and technology

The game is made on the latest version of the Unreal Engine 5 using a realistic Lumen lighting system.

The world of dark tones will meet not only with a gloomy story and atmosphere, but also with pleasant realistic graphics with high detail of objects and textures!

Among the features of the game it can be noted:

- Pleasant and detailed graphics.

- Professional voice acting of female characters.

- Unusual and atypical visual style.

- Various and beautiful achievements that carry their own message and meaning.

- More than two thousand words of text and dialog system with all the characters of the game.

- Nowhere involved unique locations.

- Saving progress in the middle of the game.

- Good optimization and stability.

highlighted.name: Repetition is the mother of learning
